definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to behead sb and display the head in public
variant of 鴟鴞|鸱鸮[chi1 xiao1]

sentences.english: When the owl sings,the nightingale will hold her peace.
Why would anyone crossbreed a perfectly serviceable bear with an owl?
sentences.chinese: 为什么有人把像熊这样非常有用的生物跟枭杂交呢？

sentences.english: On the left is M97 in the constellation Ursa Major, also known in the northern hemisphere as the Owl Nebula.
sentences.chinese: 左边是M97在大熊座，又称北半球的夜枭星云。

sentences.english: That's why the JF-17 is practically one of the first Sanction proofed planes.
sentences.chinese: 所以说枭龙战斗机实际上是一款不会受到制裁的飞机。

sentences.english: How far is it to the Owl Creek bridge?
The only people who seemed to enjoy it were the great horned Owls.
sentences.chinese: 唯一看起来享受这盛事的就是大角枭了。

sentences.english: Equip: Increases attack power by 556 in Cat, Bear, Dire Bear, and Moonkin forms only.
sentences.chinese: 在猫熊巨熊和枭兽形态提高556点攻击强度。

sentences.english: Will the night send a howlet or a bat?
sentences.chinese: 黑夜会送来一只枭或蝙蝠与我作伴吗？

sentences.english: Really the kakapo has a very similar life history to that iconic extinct bird the Dodo.
sentences.chinese: 枭鹦与绝种的渡渡鸟的生命历史十分相似。

sentences.english: I do not think that quail like than penguin-long animal owl.
sentences.chinese: 我不认为鹌鹑比企鹅长的更像枭兽。

sentences.english: He heard the cry of an owl.
His two roommates in Chengdu remind him of the quake.
sentences.chinese: 在成都的两位室友使薛枭想起当年的地震。

sentences.english: In the hush of dark I share the cheerfulness of crickets and the confidence of owls.
sentences.chinese: 在夜色的沉寂中，蟋蟀们伴我同乐，夜枭也与我交心。

definition: White Tiger (the seven mansions of the west sky)/(slang) hairless female genitalia
top gem of pendant from girdle
